attributes.action: Limit the cost of land for self build (not property development) to £10/m2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The housing shortage is creating a licence to print money for property developers and builders, whilst our descendants are less and less able to afford the property ladder.
Cap the cost of building land for single self build projects to release established properties on to the market at affordable prices and also allow first time buyers to head down the self build route as an alternative.
